title: Royally Exposed
description: One shady deal could kill them all.A mysterious illness plagues shapeshifters at the Summit, and if Jolie can't find out what's causing it, she may lose her best friend and one of her former lovers.But when a note appears demanding Jolie in exchange for the antidote, Jolie must choose between her friendsâ€¦and herself.ROYALLY EXPOSED IS A FULL LENGTH REVERSE HAREM FANTASY AND IS THE SECOND BOOK IN THE HER ROYAL HAREM SERIES. IT HAS AN HFN/HEA ENDING.
author: Catherine  Banks
